symbols.name: Ouroboros
symbols.description: A serpent or dragon eating its tail, symbolizing cycles, renewal, and the unity of opposites.

interpretations.dream: Recurring cycles or a need to break a loop

symbols.name: Mandala
symbols.description: A circular geometric figure representing the universe, integration, and balance.

interpretations.dream: Desire for order or psychological integration

symbols.name: Labyrinth
symbols.description: A winding path symbolizing initiation, inner journey, and transformation.

symbols.name: Mirror
symbols.description: A reflective surface symbolizing self-knowledge, truth, and hidden aspects.

interpretations.dream: Self-examination or confronting a hidden truth

symbols.name: River
symbols.description: Flowing water representing time, transition, and emotional movement.

symbols.name: Key
symbols.description: An object that unlocks or reveals, symbolizing access, secrets, and permission.

symbols.name: Infinity
symbols.description: The symbol of limitless scope, eternity, and unbounded possibility.

symbol_sets.name: Dream Journey
symbol_sets.description: Symbols commonly appearing in transformative dream narratives.

symbol_sets.name: Cycles of Change
symbol_sets.description: Symbols that represent renewal, continuity, and shifting states.
